channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Chained Products

item.title: CVE-2022-4872|2024-08-03T01:55:46.089Z -- unknown -- chained%20products
item.description: The Chained Products WordPress plugin before 2.12.0 does not have authorisation and CSRF checks, as well as does not ensure that the option to be updated belong to the plugin, allowing unauthenticated attackers to set arbitrary options to 'no'
